DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Artacent™ Treatment Resistant Lower Extremity Venous Diabetic Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: This study document efficacy Artacent™ Human Amniotic Membrane ( Artacent ) treatment diabetic vascular lower extremity ulcer . The study add currently available literature also assess impact treatment quality life heal economic outcome . Finally study follow patient longer previous study obtain data heal recurrence 6 month . The objective study 1 ) compare Artacent standard care ( SOC ) treatment non-healing low extremity ulcer 2 ) evaluate impact treatment patient quality life . Health economic outcome also collect . The proportion patient receive Artacent wound closure 12 week compare patient receive SOC compare . A comparison time wound closure also compare two population . Patients randomized SOC group ( control ) require treatment 12 week due incomplete wound healing , may receive treatment Artacent investigator determines potentially beneficial option .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year older Able willing give consent comply study Lower extremity ulcer 1 25 cm2 point 4 week runin period Has receive document SOC treatment 4 week great duration result < 50 % reduction ulcer size No clinical sign infection ulcer site Serum Creatinine 3.0 mg/dl Serum HgA1c 12 % Adequate circulation affect limb ABI 0.7 1.2 tri/biphasic arterial waveform ankle affected leg . Is participate another wound study Has Charcot foot Has previously receive different biological graft target foot Has one low extremity ulcer Has ulcer probe bone involve tendon , muscle , joint capsule sinus tract Is currently receive radiation chemotherapy Has autoimmune connective tissue disorder Is take medication know immune system modulator Is pregnant consider become pregnant within next 6 month
